creditline: The Anne and Hadlai Hull Fund
description: three young men crouching in foreground, with young man at left handing a pack of cigarettes and young man at center holding a record album; two young couples standing behind young men, with their arms around each other; young women are wearing blouses with the same geometric patterning (the only difference being the direction of the patterning--horizontal on girl at left, vertical on girl at right) and skirts with the same patterning of a planet with rings; girl at left wears sunglasses; painted backdrop of buildings on city street behind figures; patterned tile floor
signed: on back in pencil: Sory Sanle 2017 / LES JEUNES MÉLOMANES, 1974/2017
title: Les Jeunes Mélomanes
